courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Start your guitar journey with our beginner lessons. Learn basic chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your piano skills with advanced techniques and complex pieces. Perfect for experienced pianists looking to improve.

courses.title: Vocal Training Masterclass
courses.description: Develop your voice with our vocal training masterclass. Learn breath control, vocal exercises, and performance techniques.

courses.title: Drumming Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of drumming, including rhythm, basic beats, and coordination exercises. Ideal for beginner drummers.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation for Saxophone
courses.description: Master jazz improvisation on the saxophone with this comprehensive course. Learn scales, modes, and improvisation techniques.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony. A must-have course for all musicians.
